column5: My wife and I have a big Christmas party here at the house every year with a bunch of friends, family and neighbors and tonights the night with 35 people expected.  Last night we were just sitting here about 7:00 doing nothing and there's a knock at the door, so Diane answers it and there's a couple from down the road standing there dressed to the nines.  Diane says, "oh, you guys are early" and he says "why, weren't we sposed to be here for 7:00 o'clock ??"  Diane says, yeah, 7:00 TOMORROW NIGHT  He says "well that explains why there aren't any cars in your driveway"  We all had a good laugh and they came in for a couple drinks anyways.  Always good when we can laugh at ourselves
Better that they got it wrong than you LOL.
I wonder if he is out buying a new outfit for tonite now?   hahahaha  That's too funny, be good for a laugh Lew.  Enjoy ALL your company tonite.  Cheers  Craig
Wonder if they'll wear the same thing tonight
I'm going to remember that one! "How to go to twice as many Xmas parties as last year"! Great idea! LOL
Oh, sure, tell us about the party when it is too late to come over......
Hope your planned party is a blast. I'll be over next weekend in all my Christmas finery.
Yes, the party was a blast and everyone had a great time 'cept for the pair that came 24 hours early,  cause they never even showed up this time
